desc: Abby Rose offers specialized organic skin care for all skin types, including the most sensitive. Clinically tested. Preservative-free. Ultra-moisturizing. "My dermatologist recommended this product and it had been an absolute godsend. It completely moisturized my skin and left it glowing."

layout.text:
Calm and restore dry, sensitive skin with our
bestselling face and body balm. Steroid-free.
Preservative-free. Ultra-moisturizing.
